TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ReceiveActivity extends System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity implements class System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity, class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.IActivityEventListener`1<class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.QueueEventArgs>

type ReceiveActivity = class inherit SequenceActivity interface IEventActivity interface IActivityEventListener<QueueEventArgs>

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 服務活動，此活動會實作由 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服務合約所定義的作業。

span.span: Service activity that implements an operation defined by a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service contract.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 活動可在工作流程實作的 WCF 服務合約中定義的作業。The activity is used when a workflow implements an operation defined in a WCF service contract. 可實作來自已定義服務合約的作業，也可定義工作流程本身內部的服務合約與作業。The can implement an operation from an already defined service contract or can define the service contract and operation within the workflow itself. 後者稱為工作流程優先合約 (Workflow-first Contract)。The latter is known as a workflow-first contract. 活動支援一組預先定義的訊息交換模式。The activity supports a set of predefined message exchange patterns. 這些模式包括︰These patterns include: - 單向接收One-way receive 傳送訊息的用戶端不預期服務會傳送回應。The client that sends the message does not expect the service to send a response. 合約作業必須有虛值 (Void) 傳回型別。The contract operation should have a void return type. - 接收要求 – 傳送回應Receive request - Send response 活動接收並處理訊息之後，會將回應傳送回用戶端。After a message is received and processed by the activity, a response is sent back to the client. 當合約作業具有虛值傳回型別時，就會將認可傳回到傳送活動。When the contract operation has a void return type, an acknowledgement is sent back to the send activity. - 接收要求 – 傳送錯誤Receive request - Send fault 活動接收並處理訊息之後，會將回應或錯誤傳送回用戶端。After a message is received and processed by the activity, a response or a fault is sent back to the client. > [!NOTE] > 為了確保持續性 (Persistence) 正確執行而且不保存暫時性訊息，請確定 的子活動不會自行保存。To ensure that persistence performs properly and does not persist transient messages, make sure that child activities of the do not persist by themselves. 舉例來說，如果在 `UnloadOnIdle` 設為 `true` 的情況下建立持續性提供者，則當子活動進入閒置狀態時，就會發生這種情形。This can occur if the child activities go idle when a persistence provider was created with `UnloadOnIdle` set to `true`, for instance. > [!NOTE] > 此活動屬於[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]。This activity is part of [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]. 之對等活動[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，請參閱。For the equivalent activity in [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], see .

public: property bool CanCreateInstance { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定該作業是否會導致新工作流程服務執行個體建立的值。

span.span: Gets or sets whether the operation causes a new workflow service instance to be created.

value.span: 如果會建立新的工作流程執行個體，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if a new workflow instance is created; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若 活動的 設為 `true`，則表示當某個服務用戶端 (此用戶端不是交談的一部分) 叫用服務作業時，會建立新的服務工作流程執行個體。A activity that has set to `true` represents a service operation that, when invoked by a service client without being part of a conversation, causes a new instance of the service workflow to be created. 若服務工作流程的 活動沒有把 設為 `true`，則無法藉由用戶端叫用服務作業來具現化該服務工作流程。Service workflows that do not have a activity with set to `true` cannot be instantiated by a client using a service operation invocation. 這一類工作流程，可以使用關聯的 物件之 方法來建立。Such workflows can be created using the method of the associated object. 這個屬性的預設值為 `false`。The default value for this property is `false`. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何設定 `CanCreateInstance` 屬性。The following example shows how to set the `CanCreateInstance` property. 這段程式碼是來自 `Conversations` SDK 範例的 `ShipperWorkflow.designer.cs` 檔案。This code was adapted from the `Conversations` SDK sample, from the `ShipperWorkflow.designer.cs` file. [!code-csharp[ReceiveActivity#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/receiveactivity/cs/snippets.cs#0)]

summary.span: 取得此活動的內容訊息。

span.span: Gets the context information for this activity.

value.span: 物件，包含這個活動的內容資訊。

span.span: A object that contains context information for this activity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 內容資訊，是用戶端及其所通訊的服務之間所使用的通訊，包括相互關聯的識別。Context information is used for communication between the client and the service it is communicating with and includes such things as identification for correlation. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何存取 `Context` 屬性。The following example shows how to access the `Context` property. [!code-csharp[ReceiveActivity#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/receiveactivity/cs/snippets.cs#17)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Workflow::Activities::ContextToken ^ ContextToken { System::Workflow::Activities::ContextToken ^ get(); void set(System::Workflow::Activities::ContextToken ^ value); };
member this.ContextToken : System.Workflow.Activities.ContextToken with get, set

summary.span: 代表一個權杖，可用來指定內容，應使用此內容來將 活動與該活動所通訊的用戶端之間的交換相互關聯。

span.span: Represents a token that can be used to specify the context that should be used to correlate the exchange between a activity and the client that the activity is communicating with.
A that can be used for correlation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個 是在擁有者活動的範圍內定義。Each is defined within the scope of an owner activity. 使用者可建立兩個不同的內容權杖之模型，其名稱相同，但擁有者範圍不同。Users can model two distinct context tokens with the same name but different owner scopes. 與這些內容權杖相關聯的內容值，在執行階段是不同的。The value of the contexts associated with these context tokens are different at runtime. 根據預設，每個工作流程皆有隱含的根內容權杖，範圍是根活動層級。By default, each workflow has an implicit root context token, scoped at the root activity level. 根內容權杖的名稱是 '(RootContext)'，且 為 `null`。The name of the root context token is '(RootContext)' and the is `null`. 如果 活動沒有與其關聯的 ，就會使用根內容權杖。If a activity does not have a associated with it, the root context token is used. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取 `ContextToken` 屬性。The following code example shows how to access the `ContextToken` property. 本程式碼範例是來自 `Conversations` SDK 範例的 `SupplierWorkflow.Designer.cs` 檔案。This code example is adapted from the `Conversations` SDK sample, from the `SupplierWorkflow.Designer.cs` file. [!code-csharp[ReceiveActivity#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/receiveactivity/cs/snippets.cs#1)]

public: property System::ServiceModel::FaultException ^ FaultMessage { System::ServiceModel::FaultException ^ get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::FaultException ^ value); };
member this.FaultMessage : System.ServiceModel.FaultException with get, set

summary.span: 當接收活動執行完成時所傳回的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is returned when a receive activity completes execution.

value.span: 包含錯誤訊息文字與詳細資料的 物件。

span.span: A object that contains the fault message text and details.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若將 屬性設為 型別的執行個體，則執行完成後，該錯誤會傳回給用戶端。If the property is set to an instance of type , the fault is returned to the client upon completion. 若活動執行期間擲回例外狀況，且已設定 屬性，則會將指定的錯誤傳回給用戶端。If an exception is thrown during the activity execution and the property is set, then the specified fault is returned to the client. 若活動執行期間擲回例外狀況並已設定 屬性 (Property)，而相關作業之 屬性 (Attribute) 指定的錯誤類型符合 屬性 (Property) 的錯誤類型，則通道不算發生錯誤，用戶端仍可與伺服器通訊。If an exception is thrown during the activity execution and the property is set, and the associated operation has a attribute that specifies a fault type that matches that of the property, then the channel is not faulted and the client can still communicate to the server. 若未設定 屬性，則會把擲回的例外狀況當做錯誤傳回給用戶端。If the property is not set, the thrown exception is returned as a fault to the client. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何存取 `FaultMessage` 屬性。The following code sample shows how to access the `FaultMessage` property. [!code-csharp[ReceiveActivity#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/receiveactivity/cs/snippets.cs#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly FaultMessageProperty As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 表示目標為 屬性的 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此相依屬性可用來設定一個接收活動的 屬性與 型別的公開工作流程屬性/欄位，或另一個相同型別的活動之公開屬性/欄位之間的繫結。This dependency property can be used to set up a binding between the receive activity's property and a public workflow property/field of type or another activity's public property/field of the same type. 這個相依屬性亦可用來設定與 活動的 屬性關聯的值。This dependency property can also be used to set the value associated with the property of a activity. 這個相依屬性亦可用來取得與 活動的 屬性關聯的繫結或值。This dependency property can also be used to get the binding or value associated with the property of the activity.

span.span: Barring custom instance creation logic, the message that triggers creation of a new instance is received in the root context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 內容資訊，是用戶端及其所通訊的服務之間所使用的通訊，包括相互關聯的識別。Context information is used for communication between the client and the service it is communicating with and includes such things as identification for correlation. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用 `GetRootContext` 方法。The following example shows how to use the `GetRootContext` method. MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig object GetWorkflowServiceAttributes(object dependencyObject) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetWorkflowServiceAttributes (dependencyObject As Object) As Object

param.name: dependencyObject
param.span: 服務屬性的擷取來源物件。

span.span: The object to retrieve the service attributes from.

summary.span: 傳回由 活動所實作之服務的 屬性。

span.span: Returns the attributes for the service implemented by the activity.

summary.span: 這些屬性包括諸多項目，如 、、，以及是否要在 活動所傳回的每個錯誤中包含例外狀況詳細資訊。

span.span: These attributes include items like the , the , the , and whether to include exception details in any faults that are returned from the activity.

returns.span: ，代表包含服務屬性資料的 物件。

span.span: A that represents a object that contains service attribute data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是一個附加的相依性屬性，由 活動所定義。The property is an attached dependency property defined by the activity. 相依性屬性會附加至根工作流程，此工作流程內含在設計階段時使用 方法呼叫的 活動。This dependency property is attached to the root workflow that contains the activity using the method call at design time. 定義的服務層級行為屬性會使用 屬性，當工作流程服務啟動時，這些行為屬性會套用至工作流程服務。The property is used for defining service-level behavior attributes that are applied to the workflow service when it starts. 這些行為屬性無法在執行階段修改。These cannot be modified at runtime. > [!NOTE] > 若目前的工作流程使用 活動來啟動另一個工作流程，則被叫用的工作流程不會繼承叫用者工作流程的服務屬性。If the current workflow starts another workflow using an activity, the invoked workflow does not inherit the invoking workflow's service attributes. > [!NOTE] > 如果有針對自訂活動設定服務屬性，且該活動包含於工作流程中，這時就會使用那些服務屬性。If service attributes are set for a custom activity and that activity is included in a workflow, those service attributes are used. 只有在自訂活動做為工作流程來執行時，服務屬性才會用於自訂活動。Service attributes are only used for custom activities if the custom activity itself is run as a workflow. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用 `GetWorkflowServiceAttributes` 方法。The following example shows how to use the `GetWorkflowServiceAttributes` method. [!code-csharp[ReceiveActivity#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/receiveactivity/cs/snippets.cs#5)]

Public Custom Event OperationValidation As EventHandler(Of OperationValidationEventArgs)

summary.span: 當作業接收到訊息且需要驗證時，會發生這種情況。

span.span: Occurs when a message is received for an operation and validation is required.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是一個選用性的事件處理常式，當 活動將要接收到訊息時，會引發此事件。This is an optional event handler that is fired when the activity is about to receive a message. 關聯的處理常式可用來執行 ClaimSet 安全性檢查，來授權 活動所實作的服務作業之用戶端叫用。The associated handler can be used to perform ClaimSet-based security checks to authorize client invocation of the service operation implemented by the activity. 若在事件處理常式內將 設為 `false`，則會拒絕服務作業叫用，且用戶端會收到 。Setting to `false` in the event handler rejects the service operation invocation and the client receives a . 若 設為 `true`，則服務作業叫用會成功，且 活動會接收並處理訊息。If is set to `true`, then the service operation invocation succeeds and the activity receives and processes the message. ## Examples 下列範例顯示如何使用 `OperationValidation` 事件。The following example shows how to use the `OperationValidation` event. [!code-csharp[ReceiveActivity#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/receiveactivity/cs/snippets.cs#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly OperationValidationEvent As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 表示目標為 事件的 。

span.span: Represents the that targets the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此相依事件屬性可用來將接收活動的 事件繫結到工作流程類別上的公開事件處理常式。This dependency event property can be used to bind the receive activity's event to a public event handler on the workflow class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ParameterBindings As WorkflowParameterBindingCollection

summary.span: 取得在服務的型式參數清單中找到之可繫結參數的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of bindable parameters as found in the service's formal parameter list.
The of parameters to bind to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可用來指定服務作業參數與工作流程之公開欄位/屬性之間的繫結 (此工作流程包含 活動)。 can be used to specify a binding between the service operation parameters and public field/properties of the workflow that contain the activity. 當用戶端叫用作業時，在接收活動的執行期間，對應的參數值會寫入繫結的工作流程屬性。When a client invokes the operation, the corresponding parameter values are written to bound workflow properties during the receive activity's execution. 接收活動的子活動亦可使用 來讀取用戶端叫用時傳入的參數值。 can also be used by the receive activity's child activities to read the parameter values passed in by client invocation. 子活動可使用 集合來設定父 活動的傳回值。Child activities can use the collection to set the return value of the parent activity. 服務合約的所有參數均應包含在 `ParameterBindings` 屬性中。All parameters of the service contract should be included in the `ParameterBindings` property. 非繫結參數會導致編譯器在編譯時產生警告，且當 將此訊息傳回給用戶端時，可能會發生例外狀況。Unbound parameters cause compiler warnings upon compilation and an exception can occur when the returns this message back to the client. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何存取 `ParameterBindings` 屬性。The following example shows how to access the `ParameterBindings` property. 這段程式碼是來自 `Conversations` SDK 範例的 `ShipperWorkflow.designer.cs` 檔案。This code was adapted from the `Conversations` SDK sample, from the `ShipperWorkflow.designer.cs` file. [!code-csharp[ReceiveActivity#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/receiveactivity/cs/snippets.cs#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Workflow::Activities::OperationInfoBase ^ ServiceOperationInfo { System::Workflow::Activities::OperationInfoBase ^ get(); void set(System::Workflow::Activities::OperationInfoBase ^ value); };

summary.span: 定義 活動實作的合約與服務作業。

span.span: Defines the contract and service operation that the activity implements.

value.span: 物件，此物件包含合約名稱、合約類型、作業名稱 (可能與方法名稱不同)、該作業是否為單向作業，以及包含作業相關參數的方法資訊。

span.span: An object that contains the contract name, the contract type, the operation name, (which could be distinct from method name), whether the operation is a one-way operation, and method information including parameters about the operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可以設定為型別 或 的執行個體。The property can be set to an instance of type or . 可用來設定接收活動使用現有的 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服務合約。 can be used to configure a receive activity using an existing Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service contract. 執行個體可用來設定工作流程優先合約案例的接收活動。An instance of can be used to configure a receive activity for the workflow-first contract scenario. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何存取 `ServiceOperationInfo` 屬性。The following example shows how to access the `ServiceOperationInfo` property. 這段程式碼是來自 `Conversations` SDK 範例的 `ShipperWorkflow.designer.cs` 檔案。This code was adapted from the `Conversations` SDK sample, from the `ShipperWorkflow.designer.cs` file. [!code-csharp[ReceiveActivity#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/receiveactivity/cs/snippets.cs#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void SetWorkflowServiceAttributes (object dependencyObject, object value);
.method public static hidebysig void SetWorkflowServiceAttributes(object dependencyObject, object value) cil managed
Public Shared Sub SetWorkflowServiceAttributes (dependencyObject As Object, value As Object)
public: static void SetWorkflowServiceAttributes(System::Object ^ dependencyObject, System::Object ^ value);
static member SetWorkflowServiceAttributes : obj * obj -> unit

param.name: dependencyObject
param.span: 要套用服務屬性的物件。

span.span: The object to apply the service attributes to.

param.name: value
param.span: 包含要套用之服務屬性資料的 物件。

span.span: The object that contains the service attribute data to apply.

summary.span: 設定由 活動所實作的服務之屬性。

span.span: Sets the attributes for the service implemented by the activity.

summary.span: 這些屬性包括諸多項目，如 、，以及是否要在 活動所傳回的每個錯誤中包含例外狀況詳細資訊。

span.span: These attributes include items like the , the , and whether to include exception details in any faults that are returned from the activity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是一個附加的相依性屬性，由 活動所定義。The property is an attached dependency property defined by the activity. 相依性屬性會附加至根工作流程，此工作流程內含在設計階段時使用 方法呼叫的 活動。This dependency property is attached to the root workflow that contains the activity using the method call at design time. 定義的服務層級行為屬性會使用 屬性，當工作流程服務啟動時，這些行為屬性會套用至工作流程服務。The property is used for defining service-level behavior attributes that are applied to the workflow service when it starts. 這些行為屬性無法在執行階段修改。These cannot be modified at runtime. > [!NOTE] > 若目前的工作流程使用 活動來啟動另一個工作流程，則被叫用的工作流程不會繼承叫用者工作流程的服務屬性。If the current workflow starts another workflow using a activity, the invoked workflow does not inherit the invoking workflow's service attributes. > [!NOTE] > 如果有針對自訂活動設定服務屬性，且該活動包含於工作流程中，這時不會使用那些服務屬性。If service attributes are set for a custom activity and that activity is included in a workflow, those service attributes is not used. 只有在自訂活動做為工作流程來執行時，服務屬性才會用於自訂活動。Service attributes are only used in custom activities if the custom activity itself is run as a workflow. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用 `SetWorkflowServiceAttributes` 方法。The following example shows how to use the `SetWorkflowServiceAttributes` method. [!code-csharp[ReceiveActivity#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/receiveactivity/cs/snippets.cs#6)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是一個附加的相依性屬性，由 活動所定義。The property is an attached dependency property defined by the activity. 相依性屬性會附加至根工作流程，此工作流程內含在設計階段時使用 方法呼叫的 活動。This dependency property is attached to the root workflow that contains the activity using the method call at design time. 定義的服務層級行為屬性會使用 屬性，當工作流程服務啟動時，這些行為屬性會套用至工作流程服務。The property is used for defining service-level behavior attributes that are applied to the workflow service when it starts. 這些行為屬性無法在執行階段修改。These cannot be modified at runtime.
